entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Longueuil
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Hubert Airport 03:56 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: NE 28 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
